Name: [Measures Expressions] [Performance] Review measures that use time intelligence with Direct Query
Description: At present, time intelligence functions are known to not perform as well when using Direct Query. If you are having performance issues, you may want to try alternative solutions such as adding columns in the fact table that show previous year or previous month data.
Expression:
Model.Tables.Any(ObjectTypeName == "Table (DirectQuery)")
and
(
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"CLOSINGBALANCEMONTH\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"CLOSINGBALANCEQUARTER\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"CLOSINGBALANCEYEAR\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"DATEADD\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"DATESBETWEEN\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"DATESINPERIOD\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"DATESMTD\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"DATESQTD\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"DATESYTD\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"ENDOFMONTH\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"ENDOFQUARTER\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"ENDOFYEAR\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"FIRSTDATE\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"FIRSTNONBLANK\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"FIRSTNONBLANKVALUE\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"LASTDATE\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"LASTNONBLANK\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"LASTNONBLANKVALUE\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"NEXTDAY\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"NEXTMONTH\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"NEXTQUARTER\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"NEXTYEAR\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"OPENINGBALANCEMONTH\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"OPENINGBALANCEQUARTER\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"OPENINGBALANCEYEAR\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"PARALLELPERIOD\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"PREVIOUSDAY\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"PREVIOUSMONTH\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"PREVIOUSQUARTER\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"PREVIOUSYEAR\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"STARTOFMONTH\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"STARTOFQUARTER\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"STARTOFYEAR\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"TOTALMTD\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"TOTALQTD\s*\(")
or
RegEx.IsMatch(Expression,"TOTALYTD\s*\(")
)
